name: Gorilla Finance
description: Gorilla Finance is a decentralized trading strategy platform that is already live on BSC, further will be deployed on multi chain as well. Gorilla services financial strategists and amateur traders. The financial experts, to gain more profit, can upload their trading strategy to the platform. Meanwhile, they get a share of the profits from uploading their trading strategies. Amateur traders lack high-quality trading strategies to achieve profits. So, Gorilla provides them professional strategies to arbitrage among different DEX exchanges, maximize funds, and gain consistent profits.
